resources.string:
AndiCar is a free and open source car management software for Android powered devices.
 It is licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License, version 3.
 See the About page for more details.
 Thank you for using AndiCar!

AndiCar is a free and open source car management software for Android powered devices. It is licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License, version 3.
See the About page for more details.
Copyright © 2010 Miklos Keresztes.
Thank you for using AndiCar!
Application version:

AndiCar is a free and open source car management software for Android powered devices. It is licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
* For more information (how to's, latest news, etc.) please visit the project home page at http://sites.google.com/site/andicarfree/.
Refresh the page in your browser if you get a "Web page not available" message.
* For questions you are welcome to the AndiCar discussion list at http://groups.google.com/group/andicar.
* For bug reports or enhancement requests don\'t hesitate to use the AndiCar issue system at https://code.google.com/p/andicar/issues/list.
* You can subscribe for the project news at http://sites.google.com/site/andicarfree/News/.
* For other things you can send an email to andicar.support@gmail.com.

If you enjoy using AndiCar, please consider making a donation. All donations can be made using a PayPal account.

Thank you for using AndiCar.
